title: The transproser rehears'd, or, The fifth act of Mr. Bayes's play being a postscript to the animadversions on the preface to Bishop Bramhall's vindication, &c. : shewing what grounds there are of fears and jealousies of popery.
author: Leigh, Richard 1649 or 50-1728.
publisher: Printed for the assignes of Hugo Grotius and Jacob Van Harmine ...,
